name: Together Alone (Am Adem)
description:
Controls:
A - D for movement
Space to jump
Left Shift to dash (Only when blue)

Traverse the paths that you cannot clear alone, utilizing the abilities of both characters in order to escape. 

Created for my first ever game jam, all assets (save for music) were created by me. Music sited below.

The following music was used for this media project:
Music: Video Dungeon Crawl by Kevin MacLeod
Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/4584-video-dungeon-crawl
License (CC BY 4.0): https://filmmusic.io/standard-license
Artist website: https://incompetech.com/

Music: Mighty Like Us by Kevin MacLeod
Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/4050-mighty-like-us
License (CC BY 4.0): https://filmmusic.io/standard-license
